answers.answer: I have the same issue and my doctor is trying to assure that it is actually carpal tunnel and heat for me too. I have been having spots since I was 15weeks (almost 30 now) and we still haven't worked out to what it is

Everything else w my pregnancy is fine so I don't know what to think.. My baby is moving great. The only change in her movement is that she's moving All day and is squirming around more than kicking which I'm hoping means she's moving into position. (32 weeks) my doctor says she's measuring small but fluid levels and heart beat are fine.. My bp is always 105/62 or a bit Lower..

If your blood pressure is fine, then I wouldn't worry too much. My blood pressure is close to the too high mark and I have lots of swelling. But my doctor isn't concerned. I ask every appointment just to be sure
Your midwife should check urine for protein at every appointment if that is fine and bp is good you don't have preeclampsia.
If u don't have high blood pressure readings u can not have pre-eclampsia
Pre-eclampsia is prolonged high blood pressure that is really high like 180 over 100 or above it would have to be like stroke level hbp

Ok. Thank you everyone. I'll ask about my protein levels next appointment. Luckily it's not too far away. I haven't seen the lights in almost a week but I'll see what she says. This is my first pregnancy so I was a little scared when I read that but I've just been focusing on my baby and how she's reacting to any concern I have and I'm not seeing any signs of distress or negative changes. I love her so much and just want her to be healthy

question: So I came across an article about preaclampsia and it says swelli g in hands and seeing spots are sights of this. I didn't know that!! My hands Have been swelling and tingling but my doctor as well as a seco d opinion attributed that to carpal tunnel (which I have a history of Previously) or a strained nerve in my neck but I keep forgetting to tell them about the Lights I've been seeing (not spots, don't know of that matters) but I only see them for 3 seconds and they go away. Has only my happened 3 times. My bp is always Low though so I'm not sure what to think.. I have an appointment Monday.. Should I call my doctor or wait till then? My baby seems okay and is acting normal...
title: FREAKING OUT, please help..
